high_descs: Turn around to reach the pillow.
Pick up the white pillow from the bed.
Turn around to reach the desklamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine the pillow under the DeskLamp light.

high_descs: Turn around then turn right to the pillow cupboard.
Take the pillow near to the cupboard.
Turn around move near to the desklamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow by the light of a desk lamp

high_descs: turn around and walk to the room with the pillows on the floor.
pick up one of the pillows.
turn around and go to the desklamp.
Turn on the desklamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: pick up a pillow and go turn the DeskLamp on.
